results.name: Scarborough Beach Resort
results.description: Scarborough Beach Resort is located directly across from the beautiful Scarborough Beach, Northern boundary of Redcliffe Peninsula on Moreton Bay which makes this one of the closest Beaches to Brisbane CBD. Scarborough Beach was rightfully awarded "Queensland's friendliest beach" in 2015. Apart from our beautiful Beach we are located just across the street from one of the best Kids Parks on the Peninsular which includes the breathtaking Cottonwood Tree forest. Fortunately we are only 35 minutes from Brisbane Airport and surrounded with an array of restaurants and coffee shops, Scarborough Beach Resort is an ideal destination for both business and leisure stays. Scarborough Beach Resort offers quality and comfortable fully self-contained apartments accommodation with choice of Studio rooms and 1, 2 and 3 bedroom. Our studio rooms have queen size beds, Wi-Fi, Foxtel, direct dial phone, walk in robe, safe and are perfect for the corporate traveller that is on the move. Our 1, 2 & 3 Bed apartments have large balconies, air-conditioned with direct dial phone, Wi-Fi access (15 minutes FREE then charges apply) and Free Foxtel. Main bedrooms have Queen size beds and Twin Beds in rooms 2 and 3. For families with teenage children we offer a selection of dual key apartments that will provide much needed privacy and independence. Restaurants are conveniently located just outside our entrance doors. The Pines Restaurant formerly known as Danny's has just won the Excellence Award for Fine Food on the Peninsular again, they offer Modern Australian Cuisine and All Australian seafood. (Resort guests can charge-back their meals against their room charge). Opposite The Pines is the popular Cafe 389 which offers fantastic food in a very pleasant atmosphere. If however you are after the freshest seafood (Straight from the Trawlers) Morgan's Seafood is just a short walk from us where you can be tempted by the huge range of locally caught freshest seafood. No need to venture far Scarborough offers many shops including a Post office, newsagent, hairdresser, BWS outlet and convenience store are all just a stones throw from our resort. The Medical Centre, Scarborough Village Surgery is found just next door and offers bulk billing for children. Although we at Scarborough pride our Resort on rest & recreation for those people who need to work out even when your away we offer a well-equipped Gym, Sauna, Roman Spa & heated 25 metre heated lap pool. Redcliffe Promenade is short distance away and is famous for its Jetty Markets, open every Sunday from 8.00am to 2.00 pm. While there, you can visit tribute to Redcliffe's world famous pop-group the Bee Gees, Bee Gee Way. It's a 50 metre laneway showcasing more than 60 pictures and 13 album covers. In case you need some rest and relaxation after exploring beautiful Scarborough and surrounds, you can count on Scarborough Beach Resort facilities to do the trick! A 23 meter heated lap pool is located on level one with plenty of sun chairs on offer with the option of Heated pool/ Hydro Jet Spa and Sauna for the colder months. In the evening you can take advantage of our large open roof deck with magnificent views of Moreton Island and Glass House Mountains. For staying fit while away from home you can rely on our fully equipped gym located on level one or for those who like a real challenge why not try our Brum Pedal Car -hours of fun for the whole family riding along the miles of bikeways around our beautiful Peninsular. A meeting room is available for hire, perfect for small business meetings and equipped with broadband or wireless internet, wide screen digital projector, surround-sound and direct dial phone. It has a well-equipped kitchenette and access to large balcony where tea brakes can be taken. Getting to and around Scarborough Beach Resort is easy with local bus stop outside the property and if you are driving we offer free secure parking for all of our guests with lifts directly to your apartment. Our friendly staff at the Reception will be able to help with all the tours and transfers needed and together with great accommodation and facilities you are sure to have memorable and relaxing experience at Scarborough Beach Resort.

results.name: Park Apartments Dubai, an Edge By Rotana Hotel
results.description: Park Apartments Dubai, an Edge by Rotana Hotel with a central location in Dubai's fast-developing Al Jaddaf area, close to key business and commercial districts and popular attractions including Wafi Mall, Dubai Festival City, Dubai Creek and Dubai Cultural. Dubai International Airport is just 10 minutes away, as are iconic landmarks such as the world's tallest building, the Burj Khalifa; shopping haven Dubai Mall; and the architecturally stunning Dubai Opera House and Museum of the Future. Getting around town could not be easier, with major road nearby and the Dubai Metro just 800 metres from the hotel apartments. Designed to meet the short- and long-term accommodation requirements of families, business travellers and couples, our 84 serviced apartments are affordably priced and generously equipped with modern conveniences. Guests enjoy the comforts and services of a hotel - from complimentary Wi-Fi and daily housekeeping to complimentary tea, coffee and water - paired with the freedom of an apartment, each featuring its own kitchen. Dining preferences are covered around the clock with two flexible options, including The Cafe, open daily serving light bites and snacks when you need them. Or, if you fancy a bite, day or night, just call our 24-hour room service, with a tasty range of snacks, meals and hot and cold beverages delivered to your apartment. You can keep to your daily exercise routine in our fully equipped modern gym featuring cardiovascular machines and weight training kit or take a dip in the outdoor temperature-controlled swimming pool, open from 10.00 am to sunset.

results.name: Mulia Villas
results.description: Located on the majestic coastline of Nusa Dua, The Mulia, Mulia Resort & Villas evoke a relaxed yet polished sensibility. Cutting edge design throughout, the resort comprises three signature experiences; The Mulia is a boutique all-suite resort with 111 suites. Mulia Resort has 526 accommodations including lagoon pool rooms and suites and Mulia Villas is nestled on the hills of Nusa Dua with private pools and tropical gardens enjoying views of the Indian Ocean, offering total privacy and relaxation. Mulia Villas - Nusa Dua, Bali range in size, from one to six bedrooms. The layout of the villas was inspired by the terraced Balinese rice paddy fields, joined in layers, each with views across the Indian Ocean and private gardens. Adopting the design from traditional Balinese homes, the pavilion provides an outdoor living space with a hydrotherapy swimming pool and garden, creating an atmosphere of peace and simplicity. The Residence houses a private pool and terrace and the living room area has a lounge and restaurant that offers a la minute breakfast, afternoon tea, cocktails and canapes.

results.description: A 12 room post and beam hotel/lodge in the heart of Yoho National Park, Field BC. Home of Truffle Pigs Bistro and Lounge: award winning and nationally and internationally acclaimed eclectic bistro. This is a unique family run property in the thick of the rocky mountains that is unpretentious, comfortable, welcoming and human. The staff is likewise : energetic, passionate and professional. This property is a fantastic family hotel, romantic outdoor couples mecca, a hikers hang out and a skier friendly lodge that is minutes from some of Canada's most prestigious ski hills and mountain destinations. Winter is cozy and tranquil & summer is relaxing and chaotic: an atmosphere unlike any other in the Canadian Rockies and not to be missed. Rooms are clean and spacious, freshly renovated and affordable. The property has free parking, WiFi, coin laundry, games room, manicured gardens and immediate access to mountain terrain. Cell service is now available in Field.

We are the highest reviewed accommodation near Lavenham, rated "Excellent" by both Tripadvisor and Trivago, chosen by Tatler as one of the 12 smartest B&B's in the country and nominated for the Best B&B in the country by Eviivo in 2019.
